Package com.composum.pages.commons.service

Interface EditService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PagesEditService
    public interface EditService
    the service interface for Pages editing operations

      • isAllowedElement

        boolean isAllowedElement​(@Nonnull
                         org.apache.sling.api.resource.ResourceResolver resolver,
                         @Nonnull
                         ResourceManager.ResourceReference container,
                         @Nonnull
                         ResourceManager.ResourceReference element)
        Returns:
        'true' if the element can be a child of the container

      • getAllowedElementTypes

        List<String> getAllowedElementTypes​(@Nonnull
                                    org.apache.sling.api.resource.ResourceResolver resolver,
                                    @Nullable
                                    ComponentManager.ComponentScope scope,
                                    @Nonnull
                                    ResourceManager.ReferenceList containers,
                                    boolean resourceTypePath)
        Determines the list of resource types (nodes of type 'cpp:Component') for any of the containers.
        Parameters:
        resolver - the requests resolver (session)
        scope - the search filter configuration
        containers - the set of designated container references
        resourceTypePath - return the component path instead of resource type if 'true'
        Returns:
        the result of a component type query filtered by the filter object

      • getAllowedElementTypes

        List<String> getAllowedElementTypes​(@Nonnull
                                    org.apache.sling.api.resource.ResourceResolver resolver,
                                    @Nullable
                                    ComponentManager.ComponentScope scope,
                                    @Nonnull
                                    ResourceManager.ReferenceList containers,
                                    @Nonnull
                                    ElementTypeFilter filter,
                                    boolean resourceTypePath)
        Determines the list of resource types (nodes of type 'cpp:Component') which are accepted by the filter.
        Parameters:
        resolver - the requests resolver (session)
        scope - the search filter configuration
        containers - the set of designated container references
        filter - the filter instance (resource type pattern filter)
        resourceTypePath - return the component path instead of resource type if 'true'
        Returns:
        the result of a component type query filtered by the filter object

      • getReferencedResource

        org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource getReferencedResource​(org.apache.sling.api.resource.ResourceResolver resolver,
                                                             ResourceManager.ResourceReference reference)
                                                      throws org.apache.sling.api.resource.PersistenceException
        Returns or creates and returns the resource addressed by a reference.
        Parameters:
        resolver - the resolver to use for resource resolving and creation
        reference - the path and type of the resource
        Returns:
        the resource instance
        Throws:
        org.apache.sling.api.resource.PersistenceException

      • insertElement

        org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource insertElement​(org.apache.sling.api.resource.ResourceResolver resolver,
                                                     String resourceType,
                                                     ResourceManager.ResourceReference target,
                                                     org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource before)
                                              throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException,
                                                     org.apache.sling.api.resource.PersistenceException
        Inserts a new resource.
        Parameters:
        resolver - the resolver (session context)
        resourceType - the type of the new resource
        target - the target (the parent resource) of the move
        before - the designated sibling in an ordered target collection
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        org.apache.sling.api.resource.PersistenceException

      • moveElement

        org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource moveElement​(org.apache.sling.api.resource.ResourceResolver resolver,
                                                   org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource changeRoot,
                                                   org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource source,
                                                   ResourceManager.ResourceReference targetParent,
                                                   org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource before,
                                                   @Nonnull
                                                   List<org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource> updatedReferrers)
                                            throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException,
                                                   org.apache.sling.api.resource.PersistenceException
        Moves an element and adopts all references to the moved resource or one of its children.
        Parameters:
        resolver - the resolver (session context)
        changeRoot - the root element for reference search and change
        source - the resource to move
        targetParent - the target (a reference to the parent resource) of the move
        before - the designated sibling in an ordered target collection
        updatedReferrers - output parameter: the List of referers found - these were changed and might need setting a last modification date
        Returns:
        the new resource at the target path
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        org.apache.sling.api.resource.PersistenceException

      • copyElement

        org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource copyElement​(org.apache.sling.api.resource.ResourceResolver resolver,
                                                   org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource source,
                                                   ResourceManager.ResourceReference targetParent,
                                                   org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource before)
                                            throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException,
                                                   org.apache.sling.api.resource.PersistenceException
        Copies an element.
        Parameters:
        resolver - the resolver (session context)
        source - the resource to move
        targetParent - the target (a reference to the parent resource) of the move
        before - the designated sibling in an ordered target collection
        Returns:
        the new resource at the target path
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        org.apache.sling.api.resource.PersistenceException
